attributes.action: to provide a healthy menu option and  juicing stations on all  wards in NHS hospitals
attributes.additional_details: To provide juicing stations on all wards in all NHS hospitals for healthy and speedy healing for all patients. To ensure a healthy menu and eliminate sugar from all menus especially for cancer patients. To ensure all food and fruit and vegetables are organic. That all care staff are trained and aware on the importance of nutrition and healthy diet for all patients.
